title: Knife of Truth, Road to Megara
description: Knife of Truth, Road to Megara starts out where Cynthia Willerth's historical science fiction novel leaves off. Lance's inattention to details leave Betren struggling to reach Megara. Trac meets the Merkan council and witness a confession to the truth. Metrox's ex-son uncovers proof of the villain's plan to assault Delmarath.
author: Cynthia Willerth
